lines.text: Early this afternoon, a group of unidentified adolescents emerged from the sea. Now after careful investigation, I was able to determine that they were...
Whoever those teenagers are, I want them driven back into the sea!
Herman, gosh, it's good to hear your voice. Bring me up to date. Did Magnolia marry Cousin Fenster after all?
Yeah, he's the one on the left.
No, he's still a bachelor, but Seymour on the right, he's marryin'.
[When Junior discovers Camilla and Herman's plan to steal the Fountain of Youth, the bad guys grab her and tie her to a huge machine in the basement]
She knows too much, Herman. She must be destroyed!
Get a bomb. A big bomb!
When I turn this knob, her fate will be sealed and our secret will be safe forever.
That knob? That's the air conditioning.
Ah, but your eyes, they're so beautiful. Where did you get those eyes?

Setting this at maximum power will create ice cubes. Then as the ice cubes circulate through the pipes, crashing into each other, the frozen pressure will grow to unbearable intensity, splintering the walls until the entire place shatters in one final convulsive gasp.
